title: The Adventures of Victor Bennett: The Consulting Crusader

story.text: Victor Bennett, a renowned business consultant, stumbles upon a mysterious artifact while advising a client on organizational restructuring. The artifact, disguised as a simple pen, grants him the power to see into the future, but only business outcomes.
Armed with his new powers, Victor uses his foresight to prevent a catastrophic financial loss for a major corporation, discreetly guiding their CEO during a critical meeting.
As news of his uncanny advisory skills spreads, Victor becomes increasingly sought after. However, he remains cautious, using his powers only to prevent harm and ensure ethical business practices.
Victor encounters a rival consultant who is determined to uncover the secret behind Victor's sudden surge in success. He must navigate this challenge without exposing his supernatural abilities.

At a high stakes international conference, Victor covertly uses his powers to resolve a potential trade war. His discreet intervention ensures global market stability, though he remains an unsung hero.
Taking a well-deserved break, Victor engages in his hobbies of consulting for nonprofit organizations, applying his powers to help small startups achieve sustainability and positive social impact.

As he reflects on the week's events, Victor realizes the burden and responsibility his powers carry. He decides to continue using his gift to aid the business world while upholding his moral integrity.

ending: And so, Victor Bennett continues his dual life as a business consultant by day and a superhero by night, always ready to ensure the ethical flow of business around the world.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, especially when it intersects with the complex world of business ethics.
